title: Since2010
author: Since2010
content: Looking to buy one or more of these bad boys. I know I am a new member but will use middleman/escrow etc. Feel free to post images here of your coin(s)

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. Im sure if your serious and willing to use escrow a Casascius  will turn up for you to buy. Good luck

comments.author: Since2010
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on May 08, 2022, 07:52:52 PMWelcome to the forum. Im sure if your serious and willing to use escrow a Casascius  will turn up for you to buy. Good luckThank you very much!

comments.author: Todamont
comments.body: How much do you offer for a Cascascius V1 error coin? I may or may not know someone who holds one and may or may not be willing to sell for the right price. I was thinking somewhere in the range of 100% over face value, or 2 btc, might be fair.

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Quote from: Todamont on May 28, 2022, 07:59:15 PMHow much do you offer for a Cascascius V1 error coin? I may or may not know someone who holds one and may or may not be willing to sell for the right price. I was thinking somewhere in the range of 100% over face value, or 2 btc, might be fair.That is insane. Those coins go for 1.1 at best.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: blucepheus on May 29, 2022, 05:41:39 AMQuote from: Todamont on May 28, 2022, 07:59:15 PMHow much do you offer for a Cascascius V1 error coin? I may or may not know someone who holds one and may or may not be willing to sell for the right price. I was thinking somewhere in the range of 100% over face value, or 2 btc, might be fair.That is insane. Those coins go for 1.1 at best.Maybe in an auction setting.  I know there's no way I would even consider an offer that low for mine, but to each their own.  The last 2 Casascius coins I sold had premiums of 220% & 50%.  At 10% I would assume the offer was a joke.  I'd rather peel, claim the alts, and sell the peeled coin than deal with the headaches of making a deal, shipping, etc. for that small of a premium.
